column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I'm disappointed in this restaurants lack of communication
column2: and I'm disappointed that i had 10 people to feed who couldn't eat.  Not only does cafe ba-ba-reeba have 10 people who will NEVER eat here again
column3: they have multiple Chicago locals who will never recommend this restaurant to eat at to others.  I'm embarrassed
column4: along with all the others who stated this restaurant was classy and well equipped.  Ba Ba Reeba's lack of communication has caused a great amount of people to never dine at their establishment again.
